sen.j: 稲葉 正備（いなば まさなり、安永4年11月15日 (旧暦)（1775年12月7日） - 文化 (元号)12年3月8日 (旧暦)（1815年4月17日））は、山城国淀藩の第8代藩主。
sen.e: Masanari INABA (December 7, 1775-April 17, 1815) was the eighth lord of the Yodo domain of the Province of Yamashiro.
Masanari INABA (December 7, 1775 - April 17, 1815) was the eighth lord of the Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Province.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Provinceに訂正しました。
sen.e: Masanari INABA (December 7, 1775 - April 17, 1815) was the eighth lord of the Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Province.
The twelfth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.
The twelfth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.
The twelfth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.

sen.j: 第7代藩主・稲葉正のぶの次男。
sen.e: The second son of Masanobu INABA, the seventh lord of the domain.
The second son of Masanobu INABA, the seventh lord of the domain.
The second son of Masanobu INABA, the seventh lord of the domain.
His mother was the daughter of Munenobu MATSUDAIRA.
His mother was the daughter of Munenobu MATSUDAIRA.
His mother was the daughter of Munenobu MATSUDAIRA.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
He had a child, Masaharu INABA (the first son).
He had a child, Masaharu INABA (the first son).
He had a child, Masaharu INABA (the first son).

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、従四位下、長門国守、丹後国守。
sen.e: His official court ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade), Nagato no kuni no kami (governor of Nagato Province) and Tango no kuni no kami (governor of Tango Province).

His official court ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade), Nagato no kuni no kami (governor of Nagato Province) and Tango no kuni no kami (governor of Tango Province).

His official court ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade), Nagato no kuni no kami (governor of Nagato Province) and Tango no kuni no kami (governor of Tango Province).
He was born on November 15, 1775 (old lunar calendar).
He was born on December 7, 1775.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。 (old lunar calendar)削除しました。
sen.e: He was born on December 7, 1775.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.

sen.j: 長兄が早世したため、世子となる。
sen.e: Since his older brother died young, he became the heir.
Since his older brother died young, he became the heir.
Since his older brother died young, he became the heir.

sen.j: 文化3年（1806年）、父の死去により後を継いだ。
sen.e: He succeeded his father upon his death in 1806.
He succeeded his father upon his death in 1806.
He succeeded his father upon his death in 1806.

sen.j: 文化12年（1815年）3月8日、41歳で死去し、後を長男の正発が継いだ。
sen.e: He died on March 8, 1815 (old lunar calendar) at the age of 41, and his first son succeeded him.
He died on April 17, 1815 at the age of 41, and his first son succeeded him.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。
sen.e: He died on April 17, 1815 at the age of 41, and his first son succeeded him.
